column2: After decades of submission under the reign of foolish heathens, the Soleil Royal faith has restored it's original splendor and luminous glory. Thanks to many worthy conquests in the name of [sun_king_cultist.GetHighGodName], the partisans of the Diable have been pushed back to lands not graced by his luminous kingship of the newly anointed Solarque.
That is none of our business.
Foolish heathens, God will punish them!
